data.text: @Tinkerbellee I'm feeling...functional. I work on my feet and I don't feel faint or anything. O2 right now is 98 and steady. I'm not unwell, just not where I know I should be. Thank you for your concern. I'll be happy when the insurance kicks in and I can get a checkup.
@NancyLameOwl Are you feeling (and is the O2 looking) any better now? I hope so!

@NancyLameOwl Take care! Health is more precious than gold during these times...

I just found out my heart attack, blood clots and vomiting blood is in a direct result from COVID!!!

@bishopjeffDd I'm sure there have been many stealth Covid cases. In my case I was working in a customer facing job w/ unvaxxed & unmasked coworkers & share a house with one of them. It would have been easy to be exposed.

@NancyLameOwl My daughter in law think we all had it in late December 2019… it was a strange sickness for the fam, somewhat like the flu but somehow very different.  We just “got over it”.  But later after 2039 she said, “I think that was Covid we all had in December.” It could happen.
@bspater My health insurance kicks in after another month.  I'll be sure to get a full checkup done ASAP.
@NancyLameOwl Oh no! I'm sorry you're having trouble. I get mixed messages from doctors about a reliable antibody test for those vaxed/boosted.

@bpettichord In one more month I'll have insurance, yay me!  I'm not "sick sick" but I'm not 100% myself. I'll push thru the next month and go to the doc for a thorough checkup as soon as I'm actively insured.
@NancyLameOwl Can you check this with a doctor? Anything below 95 is concerning.
